nodes.text: Selross was a Hutt with a masculine personality who became the leader of the Vosadii kajidic during the Clone Wars. Selross led the Vosadii to engage in technological-related criminal activities and involved the clan in surveillance and espionage. By the time of the Galactic Civil War, Selross rarely left the Vosadii Techno-Palace on Sleheyron due to paranoia regarding the intentions of the Galactic Empire and the other Hutts of his clan.
